channel.title: Studio: Area of a Circle :: C# Web Development
channel.description: To get started, create a new console application in Visual Studio for the studio. Calculate the Area of a Circle Write a program that prompts the user for the radius of a circle. Calculate the area of the user’s circle and print the result. Tip Recall that the area of a circle is A = pi * r * r where pi is 3.14 and r is the radius. Here’s an example of how your program should work:
